Colgate Max Plax is worst mouthwash ever as it contains Cetylpyridinium chloride which causes brown stains on your teeth. Don't ever buy it. I have experienced brown staining of my teeth due to this mouthwash. Several dentists also advised me against using this specific mouthwash.
